metadata.title: Chat | Etendo Agents
metadata.agentDescription: Interact with an Etendo AI agent.
metadata.failed: Failed to generate metadata for agent:

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to access this agent.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.emailRequired: This agent requires a contact email before you can start chatting.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this conversation.

interface.forwardedMessage: Your message was forwarded to our team. They'll follow up shortly.

emailGate.title: We need your email before starting
emailGate.description: We ask for your email so we know who we're chatting with and can loop in a teammate when needed.
emailGate.invalid: The email you entered isn't valid.
emailGate.verificationError: We couldn't verify your email. Please try again.
emailGate.updateHint: You can update it any time.

humanAgent.active: A human teammate joined the conversation. Replies might take a little longer.

dialog.title: Provide additional feedback
dialog.description: Your feedback is valuable in helping us improve the agent.
dialog.placeholder: What did you not like about this response?
